```{r salaries}
salaries <- read.csv('ds_salaries.csv')
salaries_CAD <- salaries|>
  mutate(salary_in_usd = as.integer(salary_in_usd * 1.4))|>
  rename(salary_in_CAD = salary_in_usd) 
```
